dcterms:creator: A. Geiger
P. Lenz
R. Urtasun
dcterms:description: The KITTI dataset is commonly used in depth estimation and other computer vision tasks, providing a benchmark for evaluating algorithms in autonomous driving scenarios.
dcterms:title: KITTI

dcterms:creator: D. Eigen
R. Fergus
dcterms:description: The dataset by Eigen et al. is used for data splitting in depth estimation tasks, providing a common multi-scale convolutional architecture for predicting depth, surface normals, and semantic labels.
dcterms:title: Eigen et al. (used for data split)

dcterms:creator: C. Godard
O. Mac Aodha
M. Firman
G. J. Brostow
dcterms:description: Monodepth2 serves as a baseline for self-supervised monocular depth estimation, providing a framework for evaluating depth estimation methods.
dcterms:title: Monodepth2 (used as a baseline)
